anya-e0804n3:3_3: Tasmiṁ theyye curadhtu vattati. Coreti, corayati, coro, corī, corikā, coretu,
anya-e0804n3:6_0: Tattha lokoti tayo lokā saṅkhāraloko sattaloko okāsalokoti.
anya-e0804n3:6_1: Tattha “eko loko sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti āgataṭṭhāne saṅkhāraloko veditabbo.
anya-e0804n3:6_2: “Sassato loko’ti vā ‘asassato loko’ti vā”ti āgataṭṭhāne sattaloko.
anya-e0804n3:12_0: Atha vā lokoti tividho loko kilesaloko bhavaloko indriyalokoti.
anya-e0804n3:12_8: Tattha ye vimuttiparipācakehi indriyehi samannāgatā sattā,
anya-e0804n3:14_0: “Saṅkhāraloko sattaloko okāsaloko khandhaloko āyatanaloko dhātulokoti anekavidho loko.
anya-e0804n3:14_2: aṭṭhārasa lokā aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo’ti ettha saṅkhāraloko vutto.
anya-e0804n3:14_4: ‘Ayaṁ loko paro loko brahmaloko sadevako’tiādīsu pana sattaloko vutto.
anya-e0804n3:14_8: ettha tevattate vaso’ti ettha okāsaloko vutto”ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:15_0: Atthato pana indriyabaddhānaṁ khandhānaṁ samūho santāno ca sattaloko,
anya-e0804n3:15_3: Anindriyabaddhānaṁ rūpānaṁ samūho santāno ca okāsaloko,
anya-e0804n3:15_7: Duvidhopi cesa rūpādidhamme upādāya paññattattā upādāpaññattibhūto aparamatthasabhāvo sappaccaye pana
anya-e0804n3:15_8: rūpārūpadhamme upādāya paññattattā tadubhayassāpi upādānānaṁ vasena pariyāyato paccayāyattavuttitā upacaritabbā,
anya-e0804n3:15_11: lujjanti palujjanti cāti ettha paccayāyattavuttitāya maggaphaladhammānampi satipi lujjanapalujjanatte
anya-e0804n3:16_1: ālokenti etena bhuso passanti janā cakkhuviññāṇaṁ vāti āloko.
anya-e0804n3:16_8: Avalokananti “nāgāvalokitaṁ avaloketvā”tiādīsu viya purimakāyaṁ parivattetvā pekkhanaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:16_9: “Ālokite vilokite sampajānakārī hotī”ti etthāpi bhāvavasena ālokanaṁ ālokitaṁ vilokanaṁ vilokitanti attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n3:17_0: Thaka paṭighāte. Thaketi, thakayati dvāraṁ puriso.
anya-e0804n3:18_0: Takka vitakke. Takketi, vitakketi, vitakkayati. Takko, vitakko, vitakkitā.
anya-e0804n3:19_5: vitakkanamattameva vā etanti vitakko. “Takko, vitakko, appanā, byappanā,
anya-e0804n3:20_4: Ye imasmiṁ curādigaṇe anekassarā asaṁyogantā ikārānubandhavasena niddiṭṭhā dhātavo,
anya-e0804n3:20_5: te evaṁvuttehi imehi tīhi lakkhaṇehi samannāgatā ākhyātattaṁ nāmikattañca pāpuṇantā ekantato niggahītāgamena nipphannarūpāyeva bhavanti,
anya-e0804n3:20_6: na katthacipi vigataniggahītāgamarūpāni bhavanti. Aṅketi, aṅkayati. Aṅkanaṁ, aṅko.
anya-e0804n3:21_0: Sakka vakka bhāsane. Sakketi, sakkayati. Vakketi, vakkayati.
anya-e0804n3:22_0: Nakka vakka nāsane. Nakketi, nakkayati. Vakketi, vakkayati.
anya-e0804n3:26_0: “Cattārimāni bhikkhave cakkāni yehi samannāgatānaṁ devamanussāna”ntiādīsu hi ayaṁ sampattiyaṁ dissati.
anya-e0804n3:28_3: So hi mahājutitāya akkiyati abhitthaviyati tappasannehi janehīti akko.
anya-e0804n3:31_4: Ettha ca “bukkayati sā core” iti lokiyappayogo veditabbo.
anya-e0804n3:32_0: Daka laka assādane. Daketi, dakayati. Laketi, lakayati.
anya-e0804n3:33_0: Takka loka bhāsāyaṁ. Takketi, takkayati. Loketi, lokayati.
anya-e0804n3:34_0: Cika sika āmasane. Ciketi, cikayati. Siketi, sikayati.
anya-e0804n3:38_0: Gaṅgāya vālukā khīye, udakaṁ khīye mahaṇṇave;
anya-e0804n3:39_0: Mahiyā mattikā khīye, lakkhe na mama buddhiyā.
anya-e0804n3:40_7: Lakkhadhātuyā yupaccayantāya samādipubbānaṁ rūpānaṁ nakāro dantajo.
anya-e0804n3:43_2: Tattha makkhoti parehi kataguṇaṁ makkheti pisatīti makkho,
anya-e0804n3:43_4: “Makkhaṁ asahamāno”ti ettha pana attani parehi kataṁ avamaññanaṁ makkhoti vuccati.
anya-e0804n3:44_7: “Paramayakkhavisuddhiṁ paññāpentī”ti ettha hi yakkhasaddo satte vattati.
anya-e0804n3:44_8: Tathā hi yakkhopi sattopi devopi sakkopi khīṇāsavopi yakkhoyeva nāma,
anya-e0804n3:44_9: mahānubhāvatāya yakkhiyati saraṇagatehi janehi nānāpaccayehi nānābalīhi ca pūjiyatīti yakkho.
anya-e0804n3:45_0: Satte deve ca sakke ca, khīṇāsave ca rakkhase;
anya-e0804n3:47_0: Lakkhaālocane. Lakkheti, lakkhayati. Lakkhaṁ vijjhati usunā.
anya-e0804n3:49_5: Ettha ca “samaṇo ayaṁ pāpo atirukkhavāco”ti pāḷi nidassanaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:52_3: Ettha liṅgaṁ nāma dīgharassakisathūlaparimaṇḍalādibhedaṁ saṇṭhānanti gahaṇe atīva yujjati.
anya-e0804n3:52_5: liṅgīyati vicittaṁ kariyati avijjātaṇhākammehi utunā vā cuṇṇādīhi vā sarīramiti liṅgaṁ,
anya-e0804n3:52_7: Liṅgasaddo sadde saddappavattinimitte itthibyañjane purisabyañjane saññāṇe ākāre cāti imesu atthesu dissati.
anya-e0804n3:52_8: Ayañhi “rukkhoti vacanaṁ liṅga”nti ettha sadde dissati.
anya-e0804n3:52_10: “Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno itthiliṅgaṁ pātubhavatī”ti ettha itthibyañjane.
anya-e0804n3:52_14: “Tehi liṅgehi tehi nimittehi tehi ākārehi āgantukabhāvo jānitabbo “āgantukā ime”ti ettha ākāre dissati.
anya-e0804n3:53_0: Sadde ca tannimitte ca, kāṭakoṭacikāya ca;
anya-e0804n3:55_0: Maga anvesane. Mageti, magayati. Migo, mago, mago, magayamāno.
anya-e0804n3:56_0: Ettha ca “yathā biḷāro mūsikaṁ magayamāno”ti pāḷi nidassanaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:56_2: Ettha migoti magayati ito cito gocaraṁ anvesati pariyesatīti migo.
anya-e0804n3:56_4: Ettha visesato hariṇa migo migo nāma.
anya-e0804n3:56_5: Sāmaññato pana avasesāpi catuppadā “migo” icceva vuccanti.
anya-e0804n3:56_6: Tathā hi susīmajātake “kāḷā migā setadantā tava ime,
anya-e0804n3:56_7: parosahassaṁ hemajālābhisañchannā”ti etasmiṁ pāḷippadese hatthinopi migasaddena vuttā “kāḷamigā”ti.
anya-e0804n3:56_8: Atha vā magiyati jīvitakappanatthāya maṁsādīhi atthikehi luddehi anvesiyati pariyesiyatīti migo,
anya-e0804n3:56_11: “Atthaṁ na labhate mago”ti ettha pana mago viyāti mago,
anya-e0804n3:57_0: Magga gavesane. Maggeti, maggayati. Maggo, magganaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:58_0: Ettha ca maggoti paṭipadāya ca pakatimaggassa ca upāyassa ca adhivacanaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:58_3: Tatra paṭipadā ekantato jātijarābyādhidukkhādīhi pīḷitehi sattehi dukkhakkhayaṁ nibbānaṁ pāpuṇatthāya maggitabbo gavesitabboti maggo.
anya-e0804n3:58_5: Pakatimaggamūḷhehi ca paṭipadāsaṅkhātāriyamaggamūḷhā eva bahavo santi.
anya-e0804n3:58_6: Pakatimaggo hi kadāci eva addhikānaṁ muyhati,
anya-e0804n3:58_10: Tasmā so eva avijjāsammūḷhehi maggitabboti maggo.
anya-e0804n3:58_11: Aññesaṁ pana dvinnaṁ dhātūnaṁ vasenapi atthaṁ vadanti garū “kilese mārento gacchatīti maggo”ti.
anya-e0804n3:58_12: Taṁ taṁ kiccaṁ hitaṁ vā nipphādetukāmehi maggiyati gavesiyatīti maggo, upāyo.
anya-e0804n3:58_16: khandhāyatanādīnaṁ kusalādīnañca dhammānaṁ avabodhassa saccappaṭivedhasseva vā upāyabhāvato abhidhammakathāmaggo”ti vutto,
anya-e0804n3:58_18: So hi dīghattā maggo viyāti maggo,
anya-e0804n3:63_0: Nāva uttara setu ca, kullo ca bhisi saṅkamo”ti
anya-e0804n3:64_1: Ettha pana keci “nāvātiādīni pakatimaggassa nāmānī”ti vadanti,
anya-e0804n3:65_18: “kullo’ti kho bhikkhave ariyamaggassetaṁ adhivacana”nti ca evamādinā tattha tattha bhagavatā ariyamaggo “nāvā”tiādīhi anekehi nāmehi vutto.
anya-e0804n3:65_19: Aṭṭhakathācariyehipi suttanipātaṭṭhakathāyaṁ “baddhā bhisi susaṅkhatā bhagavā”ti etasmiṁ padese evaṁ
anya-e0804n3:65_20: atthasaṁvaṇṇanā katā “bhisīti pattharitvā puthulaṁ katvā baddhā ‘kullā’ti vuccati loke,
anya-e0804n3:67_0: Nāvā uttara setu ca, kullo ca bhisi saṅkamo;
anya-e0804n3:69_0: Evaṁ ācariyehi katāya atthasaṁvaṇṇanāya dassanato ca “nāvātiādīnipi pakatimaggassa nāmānī”ti vacanaṁ na gahetabbaṁ,
anya-e0804n3:70_0: Koci panettha evaṁ vadeyya “dhammasetuṁ daḷhaṁ katvā’ti ettha ‘dhammasetunti maggasetu’nti vacanato dhammasaddo magge vattati,
anya-e0804n3:70_2: dhammasaddo viya setusaddopi magge vattatīti setu viyāti setu,
anya-e0804n3:70_5: Aparampi vadeyya “nanu brahmajālasuttantaṭṭhakathāyaṁ ‘dakkhiṇuttarena bodhimaṇḍaṁ pavisitvā assatthadumarājānaṁ
anya-e0804n3:70_6: padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pubbuttarabhāge ṭhito’ti imasmiṁ ṭhāne dakkhiṇuttarasaddena dakkhiṇo maggo vutto”ti.  Na,
anya-e0804n3:70_7: anekesu pāḷippadesesu aṭṭhakathāpadesesu ca abhidhānasatthesu ca maggavācakassa uttarasaddassa anāgatattā,
anya-e0804n3:70_8: tasmā tattha evamattho daṭṭhabbo “dakkhiṇadisato gantabbo uttaradisābhāgo dakkhiṇuttaroti vuccati,
anya-e0804n3:70_9: evaṁbhūtena dakkhiṇuttarena bodhimaṇḍapavisanaṁ sandhāya dakkhiṇuttarena bodhimaṇḍaṁ pavisitvāti vutta”nti.
anya-e0804n3:70_12: Evaṁ gahaṇaṁyeva hi yaṁ jātakanidāne vuttaṁ “bodhisatto tiṇaṁ gahetvā bodhimaṇḍaṁ ārūyha dakkhiṇadisābhāge uttarābhimukho aṭṭhāsi,
anya-e0804n3:70_13: tasmiṁ khaṇe dakkhiṇacakkavāḷaṁ osīditvā heṭṭhā avīcisampattaṁ viya ahosi,
anya-e0804n3:70_14: uttaracakkavāḷaṁ ullaṅghitvā upari bhavaggappattaṁ viya ahosi,
anya-e0804n3:70_15: bodhisatto idaṁ sambodhipāpuṇaṭṭhānaṁ na bhavati maññeti padakkhiṇaṁ karonto pacchimadisābhāgaṁ gantvā puratthābhimukho aṭṭhāsī”tiādi,
anya-e0804n3:70_18: evañca sati “dakkhiṇuttarenā”ti enayogaṁ avatvā “dakkhiṇuttarāyā”ti āyayogo vattabbo”ti. Tanna,
anya-e0804n3:73_3: Sāsanasmiñhi bhūvādigaṇacurādigaṇapariyāpannassa gatyatthavācakaullaṅghanatthaparidīpakassa dhātussa rūpaṁ atīva pasiddhaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:77_0: Imasmiṁ sattilaṅghanajātake curādigaṇapariyāpannassa gatyatthavācakassa ullaṅghanatthaparidīpakassa laṅghadhātussa “laṅghayitvā,
anya-e0804n3:77_3: Bhāsatthavācakassa pana tathārūpāni rūpāni na diṭṭhāni,
anya-e0804n3:77_4: evaṁ santepi pubbācariyehi dīghadassīhi abhimatattā bhāsatthavācikāpi laṅghadhātu atthīti gahetabbā,
anya-e0804n3:77_5: evaṁ sabbesupi bhūvādigaṇādīsu sāsane appasiddhānampi rūpānaṁ sāsanānukūlānaṁ gahaṇaṁ veditabbaṁ,
anya-e0804n3:78_0: Agha pāpakaraṇe. Agheti, aghayati. Aghaṁ, agho, anagho.
anya-e0804n3:79_6: Tattha aghayanti pāpaṁ karonti sattā etenāti aghaṁ, kintaṁ? Dukkhaṁ,
anya-e0804n3:79_8: Nanu ca sappurisā dukkhahetupi kilesahetupi ca attano sukhatthāya pāpaṁ na karonti.
anya-e0804n3:83_0: Chandā ca dosā na jahanti dhamma”nti
anya-e0804n3:84_1: Evaṁ sante kasmā “agha pāpakaraṇe”ti dhātu ca “aghayanti pāpaṁ karonti sattā etenāti agha”ntiādivacanañca vuttanti? Saccaṁ,
anya-e0804n3:84_2: yebhuyyena pana sattā dukkhādihetu pāpakammaṁ karonti,
anya-e0804n3:84_5: Evaṁ pāpakaraṇassa hi dukkhaṁ kileso ca hetu.
anya-e0804n3:89_1: Ayañhi gāthā dukkhahetupi sattā pāpaṁ karontīti etamatthaṁ dīpeti.
anya-e0804n3:89_3: kuddho hanti samātara”nti ayaṁ pana kilesahetupi pāpaṁ karontīti etamatthaṁ dīpeti,
anya-e0804n3:92_0: Loca dassane. Loceti, locayati. Locanaṁ. Rūpārammaṇaṁ locayati passatīti locanaṁ, cakkhu.
anya-e0804n3:93_0: Kici maddane. Kiñceti, kiñcayati. Kiñcanaṁ, akiñcano.
anya-e0804n3:94_3: Manussā hi vīhiṁ maddantā goṇaṁ “kiñcehi kāpila,
anya-e0804n3:95_0: Paci vitthāre. Pañceti, pañcayati. Papañceti, papañcayati. Papañcā.
anya-e0804n3:96_1: Etā hi attanissitānaṁ sattānaṁ saṁsāraṁ papañcenti vitthinnaṁ karontīti papañcāti vuccanti.
anya-e0804n3:96_2: Atha vā papañcenti yattha sayaṁ uppannā taṁsantānaṁ vitthārenti ciraṁ ṭhapentīti papañcā.
anya-e0804n3:96_3: Lokiyā pana “amhākaṁ tumhehi saddhiṁ kathentānaṁ papañco hotī”tiādīni vadantā kālassa cirabhāvaṁ papañcoti vadanti,
anya-e0804n3:100_0: Cu cavane. Cāveti, cāvayati. Añño “cu sahane” iti brute. Cāveti, cāvayati, sahatīti attho.
anya-e0804n3:102_1: locayati samavisamaṁ ācikkhantaṁ viya bhavatīti locanaṁ, cakkhu.
anya-e0804n3:103_0: Raca patiyatane. Raceti, racayati. Racanā, viracitaṁ, kesaracanā, gāthāracanā.
anya-e0804n3:104_0: Sūcapesuññe. Pisuṇabhāvo pesuññaṁ. Sūceti, sūcayati. Sūcako.
anya-e0804n3:107_5: vācayatī”ti rūpāni. Vattuṁ, vattave, vatvā, vuttaṁ, vuccati.
anya-e0804n3:109_0: Sūca gandhane. Suceti, sūcayati. Sūcako, suttaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:110_0: Ettha ca attatthaparatthādibhede atthe sūcetīti suttaṁ. Tepiṭakaṁ buddhavacanaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:112_0: Ettha kaccoti rūpasampattiyā kacceti dibbati virocatīti kacco,
anya-e0804n3:116_0: Ettha milakkhūti mileccheti abyattavācaṁ bhāsatīti milakkhu.
anya-e0804n3:117_0: Kuccha avakkhepe. Avakkhepo adhokhipanaṁ. Kuccheti, kucchayati.
anya-e0804n3:121_0: Vajja vajjane. Vajjeti, vajjayati. Parivajjanako. Vajjito sīlavantehi, kathaṁ bhikkhu karissasīti.
anya-e0804n3:123_0: Tuji piji hiṁsābaladānaniketanesu. Niketanaṁ nivāso. Tuñjeti, tuñjayati. Piñjeti. Piñjayati.
anya-e0804n3:125_0: Khaji rakkhaṇe. Tādisāniyeva rūpāni. Bhūvādigaṇe “khaji gativekalleti imissā “khañjatī”ti rūpaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:126_1: Esāva pūjanā seyyo. Pūjako, pūjito, pūjanīyo,
anya-e0804n3:130_0: Tajja santajjane. Tajjeti, tajjayati. Santajjeti, santajjayati. Santajjito.
anya-e0804n3:132_0: Sajja sajjane. Sajjeti, sajjayati dānaṁ. Gamanasajjo hutvā.
anya-e0804n3:133_0: Bhaja vissāse. Bhajeti, bhajayati. Bhūvādigaṇe pana “bhajatī”ti rūpaṁ, bhatti, sambhatti.
anya-e0804n3:134_0: Tuji piji luji bhaji bhāsāyaṁ. Tuñjeti,
anya-e0804n3:139_0: Yuja saṁyamane. Saṁpubbo bandhane. Yojeti, yojayati. Saṁyojeti, saṁyojayati. Saṁyojanaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:140_0: Majja soceyyālaṅkāresu. Majjeti, majjayati. Sammajjeti, sammajjayati. Sammajjā.
anya-e0804n3:141_0: Bhājabhājanadānesu. Bhājeti, bhājayati. Kathaṁ vessantaro putto, gajaṁ bhājeti sañcaya.
anya-e0804n3:148_0: Naṭa avasandane. Avasandanaṁ gattavikkhepo. Naṭeti, naṭayati.
anya-e0804n3:149_0: Cuṭa chuṭa kuṭṭa chedane. Cuṭeti, cuṭayati. Chuṭeti, chuṭayati. Kuṭṭeti, kuṭṭayati.
anya-e0804n3:150_0: Puṭṭa caṭṭa appabhāve. Puṭṭeti, puṭṭayati. Cuṭṭeti, cuṭṭayati, appaṁ bhavatīti attho.
anya-e0804n3:152_0: Aṭṭa suṭṭa anādare. Aṭṭeti, aṭṭayati. Suṭṭeti, suṭṭayati.
anya-e0804n3:155_0: Tuvaṭṭa nipajjāyaṁ. Tuvaṭṭeti, tuvaṭṭayati. Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū ekamañce tuvaṭṭenti.
anya-e0804n3:158_0: Kīṭa bandhe. Bandho bandhanaṁ. Kīṭeti, kīṭayati. Kīṭo.
anya-e0804n3:161_0: Kūṭa appasāde. Kūṭeti, kūṭayati. Kūṭaṁ rajataṁ. Kūṭā gāvī. Kuṭatāpaso.
anya-e0804n3:162_0: Cuṭa puṭa phuṭa vibhede. Cuṭeti, cuṭayati. Poṭeti, poṭayati. Phoṭeti, phoṭayati. Aṅguliyo phoṭesuṁ.
anya-e0804n3:163_0: Ghaṭa saṅghāṭe hantyatthe ca. Ghaṭeti, ghaṭayati.
anya-e0804n3:164_0: Paṭa puṭa luṭa ghaṭa ghaṭi bhāsāyaṁ. Pāṭeti, pāṭayati. Poṭeti, poṭayati. Loṭeti, loṭayati. Ghāṭeti,
anya-e0804n3:165_0: Paṭa vaṭa ganthe. Paṭeti, paṭayati. Vaṭeti, vaṭayati.
anya-e0804n3:178_0: Ettha saṭhoti kerāṭiko. Saṭhayatīti saṭho, na sammā bhāsatīti attho.
anya-e0804n3:182_0: Ettha sākuṇiko “kitavā”ti vutto. Tassa idaṁ ketavaṁ, tasmiṁ ketave ayaṁ dhātu vattatīti attho.
anya-e0804n3:186_0: Paṭi parihāse. Paṇḍeti, paṇḍayati. Uppaṇḍeti, uppaṇḍayati. Manussānaṁ naṁ bhikkhuniṁ uppaṇḍiṁsu.
anya-e0804n3:188_0: Khaḍi kaḍi chede. Khaṇḍeti, khaṇḍayati. Kaṇḍeti, kaṇḍayati. Khaṇḍo, kaṇḍo.
anya-e0804n3:190_0: Ettha ca piṇḍoti samūhasaṅkhāto kalāpopi “coḷaṁ piṇḍo rati khiḍḍā”ti ettha vutto āhārasaṅkhāto piṇḍopi piṇḍoyeva.
anya-e0804n3:192_0: Maḍi bhūsāyaṁ hasane ca. Maṇḍeti, maṇḍayati. Maṇḍo, maṇḍanaṁ, maṇḍito.
anya-e0804n3:193_0: Bhaḍi kalyāṇe. Kalyāṇaṁ kalyāṇatā. Bhaṇḍeti, bhaṇḍayati. Bhaṇḍo.
anya-e0804n3:194_0: Ettha ca bhaṇḍoti dhanaṁ, alaṅkāro vā. “Bhaṇḍaṁ gaṇhāti. Samalaṅkaritvā bhaṇḍenā”ti ca ādīsu viya.
anya-e0804n3:199_0: Vaḍḍha ākiraṇe. Kaṁsapātiyā pāyāsaṁ vaḍḍheti, vaḍḍhayati. Bhattaṁ vaḍḍhetvā adāsi.
anya-e0804n3:203_2: “Kadā saññūḷhā pana te gahapati samaṇassa gotamassa vaṇṇā”ti evamādīsu thutiyaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:204_0: Tattha chaviyanti chavigatā vaṇṇadhātu eva “suvaṇṇavaṇṇo”ti ettha vaṇṇaggahaṇena gahitāti apare.
anya-e0804n3:204_4: Vaṇṇiyati phalaṁ etena yathāsabhāvato vibhāviyatīti vaṇṇo, kāraṇaṁ,
anya-e0804n3:204_10: Evaṁ tena tena pavattinimittena vaṇṇasaddassa tasmiṁ tasmiṁ atthe pavatti veditabbā.
anya-e0804n3:206_0: “Na harāmi na bhañjāmi, ārā siṅghāmi vārijaṁ;
anya-e0804n3:207_0: Atha kena nu vaṇṇena, gandhathenoti vuccatī”ti
anya-e0804n3:208_2: “Kadā saññūḷhā pana te gahapati samaṇassa gotamassa vaṇṇā”tiādīsu guṇe.
anya-e0804n3:209_0: Chaviyaṁ thutiyaṁ heme, kulavagge ca kāraṇe;
anya-e0804n3:215_0: Cuṇṇa peraṇe. Cuṇṇeti, cuṇṇayati. Cuṇṇaṁ. Cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṁ karoti.
anya-e0804n3:217_0: Kuṇa saṅkocane. Kuṇeti, kuṇayati. Kuṇo. Kuṇahattho. Hatthena kuṇī.
anya-e0804n3:219_0: Ettha tūṇīti sarakalāpo. Sā hi tūṇenti pūrenti sare etthāti tūṇī.
anya-e0804n3:222_0: Ettha kāṇoti ekena vā dvīhi vā akkhīhi parihīnakkhi.
anya-e0804n3:222_4: Itarathā kāṇakacchapopamasutte vutto kacchapo ekasmiṁ kāṇo siyā,
anya-e0804n3:222_5: ekakkhikāṇo ca pana puriso “andho”ti na vattabbo siyā,
anya-e0804n3:222_6: tasmā tesamayugaḷatte ekekassa yathāsambhavaṁ dvinnaṁ dvinnamākārānaṁ vācakatā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0804n3:222_7: Tathā hi kosalasaṁyuttaṭṭhakathāyaṁ “kāṇoti ekacchikāṇo vā ubhayacchikāṇo vā”ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:222_8: Atha vā “ovadeyyānusāseyyā”ti ettha ovādānusāsanānaṁ viya savisesatā avisesatā ca daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0804n3:223_0: Gaṇa saṅkhyāne. Gaṇeti, gaṇayati. Gaṇanā, gaṇo.
anya-e0804n3:237_1: tathāpi saṅghagaṇasaddāyeva vināpi visesakapadena bhikkhusamūhe vattanti, nāññe,
anya-e0804n3:237_2: aññe pana saṅghagaṇasaddehi saddhiṁ aññamaññañca kadāci samānatthavisayā honti,
anya-e0804n3:239_0: Kuṇa guṇa āmantane. Kuṇeti, kuṇayati. Guṇeti, guṇayati. Guṇo. Goṇo.
anya-e0804n3:240_2: Goṇāpiyati āmantāpiyati attani patiṭṭhito puggalo daṭṭhuṁ sotuṁ pūjituñca icchantehi janehīti guṇo.
anya-e0804n3:240_4: tathāpi taṁhetuāmantanaṁ nimantanañca teyeva karonti nāmāti evaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:245_0: Ettha kassakassa tuṭṭhiuppattikāraṇattā hetuvasena niccetanassapi phalassa tosanaṁ vuttaṁ,
anya-e0804n3:245_2: Aññe pana “guñjante abyayante iti guṇā”ti atthaṁ vadanti.
anya-e0804n3:247_0: Ettha vaṇoti aru. Sā hi sarīraṁ vaṇayati vicuṇṇeti chiddāvachiddaṁ karotīti vaṇoti vuccati.
anya-e0804n3:248_0: Paṇṇa harite. Paṇṇeti, paṇṇayati. Tālapaṇṇaṁ. Sūpeyyapaṇṇaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:249_0: Ettha ca haritabhāvavigatepi vatthusmiṁ paṇṇabhāvo rūḷhito pavattoti daṭṭhabbo. “Paṇṇaṁ, pattaṁ, palāso,
anya-e0804n3:250_0: Paṇa byavahāre. Paṇeti, paṇayati. Rājā ca daṇḍaṁ garukaṁ paṇeti.
anya-e0804n3:254_4: kasmā “ārammaṇaṁ cintetīti citta”nti vatvāpi “vijānātīti attho”ti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0804n3:254_7: duppaññassa hi nānappakārehi cintayatopi sukhumatthādhigamo na hotīti? Saccaṁ,
anya-e0804n3:254_8: “vijānātī”ti idaṁ padaṁ cittassa saññāpaññākiccehi visiṭṭhavisayaggahaṇaṁ dīpetuṁ vuttaṁ sabbacittasādhāraṇattā cittasaddassa.
anya-e0804n3:254_11: tasmā vijānanatthaṁ gahetvā saññāpaññākiccāvisiṭṭhavisayaggahaṇaṁ dīpetuṁ “vijānātī”ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:255_2: taṁ javanavīthivasena attano santānaṁ cinotīti cittaṁ,
anya-e0804n3:255_6: sabbassa tassa citteneva karaṇato citteti vicitteti vicittaṁ kariyati etenāti cittaṁ,
anya-e0804n3:256_0: Ettha hi cittassa sarāgasadosādibhedabhinnattā sampayuttabhūmiārammaṇahīnamajjhimapaṇītādhipatīnaṁ vasena cittassa cittatā veditabbā.
anya-e0804n3:256_1: Kiñcāpi ekassa cittassa evaṁ vicittatā natthi,
anya-e0804n3:256_2: tathāpi vicittānaṁ antogadhattā samudāyavohārena avayavopi “citta”nti vuccati,
anya-e0804n3:256_3: yathā pabbatanadīsamuddādiekadesesu diṭṭhesu pabbatādayo diṭṭhāti vuccanti.
anya-e0804n3:256_4: Tenāhu aṭṭhakathācariyā “kāmañcettha ekameva evaṁ cittaṁ na hoti,
anya-e0804n3:256_5: cittānaṁ pana antogadhattā etesu yaṁ kiñci ekampi cittatāya ‘citta’nti vattuṁ vaṭṭatī”ti.
anya-e0804n3:257_0: Ettha ca vuttappakārānamatthānaṁ vinicchayo bavati. Kathaṁ?
anya-e0804n3:257_1: Yasmā yattha yattha yathā yathā attho labbhati,
anya-e0804n3:257_7: taṁ parittakriyadvayaṁ antimajavanañca labbhamānacintanavicittatādivasena cittanti veditabbaṁ,
anya-e0804n3:259_0: Cittaṁ mano mānasañca, viññāṇaṁ hadayaṁ manaṁ;
anya-e0804n3:261_0: Cittasaddo paññattiyaṁ viññāṇe vicitte cittakamme acchariyeti evamādīsu atthesu dissati.
anya-e0804n3:261_5: “Diṭṭhaṁ vo bhikkhave caraṇaṁ nāma citta”ntiādīsu cittakamme.
anya-e0804n3:262_1: Ratto kho brāhmaṇa rāgena abhibhūto attabyābādhāyapi ceteti,
anya-e0804n3:263_1: saddhiṁ attanā sampayuttadhamme ārammaṇe abhisandahatīti attho.
anya-e0804n3:266_0: Atrāyaṁ pāḷi “cetanāhaṁ bhikkhave kammaṁ vadāmi, cetayitvā kammaṁ karoti kāyena vācāya manasā”ti.
anya-e0804n3:268_4: tasmā hi manto khippamupeti bheda”nti ettha hi guttabhāsanaṁ “manto”ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n3:268_8: Ettha sikkhā nirutti kappa byākaraṇa jotisattha chandovicitivasena manto “chaḷaṅgo”ti veditabbo.
anya-e0804n3:269_0: Yanta saṅkocane. Yanteti, yantayati. Yantaṁ, telayantaṁ yathācakkaṁ, evaṁ kampati medanī.
anya-e0804n3:271_0: Santa āmappayoge. Āmappayogo nāma ussannakriyā. Santeti, santayati.
anya-e0804n3:273_0: Tanta kuṭumbadhāraṇe. Tanteti, tantayati. Satanto, sappadhānoti attho.
anya-e0804n3:277_2: Tattha sukhanaṁ sukhaṁ. Vāteti, vātayati. Vāto,
anya-e0804n3:279_0: Satta santānakriyāyaṁ. Santānakriyā nāma pabandhakriyā avicchedakaraṇaṁ. Satteti, sattayati. Satto.
anya-e0804n3:282_0: Pāḷiyaṁ pana “gatasattaṁ jaraggava”nti pāṭhassa “vigatajīvitaṁ jiṇṇagoṇa”nti atthaṁ saṁvaṇṇesuṁ.
anya-e0804n3:282_2: “na sukarā uñchena paggahena yāpetu”nti ettha paggahasaddassa pattakathanaṁ viya.
anya-e0804n3:285_0: Kattarasethille. Kattareti, kattarayati. Kattaro. Kattaradaṇḍo, kattarasuppaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:286_3: Kattarayati aṅgānaṁ sithilabhāvena sithilo bhavatīti atthena.
anya-e0804n3:286_4: Kattaradaṇḍoti kattarehi jiṇṇamanussehi ekantato gahetabbatāya kattarānaṁ daṇḍo kattaradaṇḍo.
anya-e0804n3:287_0: Citta cittakaraṇe, kadāci dassanepi. Cittakaraṇaṁ vicittabhāvakaraṇaṁ. Citteti, cittayati. Cittaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:290_0: Katha kathane. Katheti, kathayati. Dhammaṁ sākacchati. Sākacchā, kathā, parikathā, aṭṭhakathā.
anya-e0804n3:291_0: Tattha sākacchatīti saha kathayati. Attho kathiyati etāyāti aṭṭhakathā, tthakārassa ṭṭhakārattaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:295_5: idha pana ikārantavasena kathitassa saniggahītāgamāni rūpāni niccaṁ bhavantīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:299_0: Putha bhāsāyaṁ. Potheti, pothayati. Kathetīti attho.
anya-e0804n3:300_0: Putha pahāre. Potheti, pothayati. Kumāre pothetvā agamāsi.
anya-e0804n3:307_0: Santha gantha santhambhe. Santheti, santhayati. Gantheti, ganthayati. Gantho.
anya-e0804n3:310_0: Hadakarīsussagge. Karīsussaggo karīsassa ussaggo vissajjanaṁ. Hadeti, hadayati. Ohadeti, ohadayati.
anya-e0804n3:311_2: tasmā vidadhātu anubhavane vattatīti attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n3:311_4: Dukkhaṁ vedanaṁ vedeti. Vedayati. Vedanā, vitti.
anya-e0804n3:313_0: Mida sinehane. Atra sineho nāma pīti. Medeti, medayati.
anya-e0804n3:315_0: Tatra chattanti ātapattaṁ. Ātapaṁ chādetīti chattaṁ. Paṭicchādiyateti channā.
anya-e0804n3:316_0: Cuda sañcodane āṇattiyañca. Codeti, codayati. Codako, cuditako, codanā. Ānando buddhacodito.
anya-e0804n3:317_0: Tatra codanāti cālanā. Cālanāti dosāropanāti attho.
anya-e0804n3:322_0: Ettha ca “maṁ saddāyatīti saññāya vegena udake patī”ti aṭṭhakathāpāṭho nidassanaṁ,
anya-e0804n3:322_1: idaṁ “pabbatāyatī”ti rūpaṁ viya dhātuvasena nipphannaṁ na hotīti na vattabbaṁ,
anya-e0804n3:322_5: Atha vā saddiyati attho anenāti saddo.
anya-e0804n3:325_0: Kanda sātacce. Sātaccaṁ satatabhāvo nirantarabhāvo. Kandeti, kandayati.
anya-e0804n3:326_0: Muda saṁsagge. Ekatokaraṇaṁ saṁsaggo. Modeti, modayati sattūni sappinā.
anya-e0804n3:327_1: Hetukatturūpānīti na vattabbāni pāḷidassanato “sīho ca sīhanādena,
anya-e0804n3:328_0: Sada assādane. Sādeti, sādayati. Assādeti, assādayati. Ettha āupasaggo rassavasena ṭhito.
anya-e0804n3:329_0: Gada devasadde. Devasaddo vuccati meghasaddo. Gadeti, gadayati.
anya-e0804n3:332_1: Nanu bho yo catudhā vā pañcadhā vā anekasatadhā vā chindati,
anya-e0804n3:332_2: tassa taṁ chedanaṁ dvedhākaraṇaṁ nāma na hoti,
anya-e0804n3:332_3: evaṁ sante kasmā sāmaññena avatvā “dvedhākaraṇe”ti dvidhā gahaṇaṁ katanti?
anya-e0804n3:332_4: Dvidhākaraṇaṁ nāma na hotīti na vattabbaṁ,
anya-e0804n3:332_6: Aparassa hi aparassa chinnakoṭṭhāsassa pubbena ekena koṭṭhāsena saddhiṁ apekkhanavasena dvidhākaraṇaṁ hotiyeva. Chedeti,
anya-e0804n3:333_0: Yo te hatthe ca pāde ca, kaṇṇanāsañca chedayi;
anya-e0804n3:334_0: Tassa kujjha mahāvīra, mā raṭṭhaṁ vinassa idaṁ;
anya-e0804n3:335_0: Yo me hatthe ca pāde ca, kaṇṇanāsañca chedayi;
anya-e0804n3:336_0: Ciraṁ jīvatu so rājā, na hi kujjhanti mādisāti.
anya-e0804n3:337_0: Chada apavāraṇe. Chādeti, chādayati. Chattaṁ. Purisassa bhattaṁ chādayati.
anya-e0804n3:338_0: Īdī sandīpane. Īdeti, īdayati. Īkārantavasena niddiṭṭhattā saniggahītāgamāni rūpāni na bhavanti.
anya-e0804n3:341_11: “Vādo jappo vitaṇḍā”ti evaṁvidhāsu tīsu kathāsu vādasaṅkhātā kathā.
anya-e0804n3:342_6: Purisassa bhattaṁ chādayamānaṁ tiṭṭhati chādentaṁ vā.
anya-e0804n3:343_2: tasmā imassapi saniggahītāgamāni rūpāni na bhavanti. Vādeti, vādayati, vandati,
anya-e0804n3:344_4: vandanto hi atthato evaṁ vadāpeti nāmā”ti hetukattuvasena abhivādanasaddattho vutto,
anya-e0804n3:344_5: amhehi pana vandanasaddaṁ saddasatthanayamaggahetvā suddhakattuvasena attho kathito.
anya-e0804n3:344_7: na vadāpanaṁ abhisaddena sambandhitattā “abhivādanasīlissā”ti ettha viya.
anya-e0804n3:345_0: Athāpi siyā “kassaci vuddhena visiṭṭhaṁ vadāpanaṁ abhivādana”nti,
anya-e0804n3:345_3: chidi dvidhākaraṇe”tiādinā bhāvavasena atthappakāsanamatteyeva “pacati, paccati, pāceti. Chindati, chijjati,
anya-e0804n3:345_4: chedāpetī”tiādīni sakammakāni ceva akammakāni ca sakāritāni ca rūpāni nipphajjanti,
anya-e0804n3:345_5: na ca tadatthāya visuṁ visuṁ dhātuniddeso kariyati.
anya-e0804n3:345_6: Tasmā “vadī abhivādanathutīsū”ti ettha kāritavasena dhātuattho kathitotipi vattuṁ na sakkā kriyāsabhāvattā dhātūnaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:346_6: Yadi “abhivādetvā”ti imassa padassa “sukhī arogo hotū’ti vadāpetvā”ti attho siyā,
anya-e0804n3:346_7: “sirasā abhivādayi”nti ettha “sirasā”ti padaṁ na vattabbaṁ siyā vadāpanena asambandhattā.
anya-e0804n3:346_11: Yasmā bhūvādigaṇe “vanda abhivādānathutīsū”ti imassa dhātussa “vandatī”ti padarūpassa “abhivandati,
anya-e0804n3:346_14: Tathā hi “vande sugataṁ gativimutta”nti padānamatthaṁ vadantena ṭīkācariyenapi “vandeti vandāmi,
anya-e0804n3:347_15: tasmā taṁ kāritapaccayantaṁ na hotīti siddhaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:348_0: Imassatthassa āvibhāvatthaṁ imasmiṁ ṭhāne sāṭṭhakathaṁ vidhurajātakappadesaṁ vadāma.
anya-e0804n3:350_0: Yaṁ naro hantumiccheyya, taṁ kammaṁ nupapajjatī”ti
anya-e0804n3:351_3: kathaṁ vā tena attānaṁ abhivādāpayetha ve.
anya-e0804n3:351_4: Tassa hi taṁ kammaṁ na upapajjatī”ti.
anya-e0804n3:351_7: Evaṁ vibhāgaṁ pana ñatvā pāḷiyā aṭṭakathāya ca adhippāyo gahetabbo “naro yaṁ puggalaṁ hantuṁ iccheyya,
anya-e0804n3:351_8: so hantā taṁ vajjhaṁ puggalaṁ kathaṁ nu abhivādeyya,
anya-e0804n3:351_10: tena vajjhena maṁ vandāhīti attānaṁ kathaṁ vandāpeyyā”ti.
anya-e0804n3:351_11: Ettha pana “rājāno coraṁ sunakhehipi khādāpentī”tiādīsu viya karaṇavasena “tena vajjhenā”ti padaṁ yojitaṁ,
anya-e0804n3:351_12: attho pana “taṁ vajjha”nti upayogavacanavasena daṭṭhabbo dvikammakattā sakāritapaccayassa sakammakadhātuyāti.
anya-e0804n3:351_13: Nanu evaṁ sante “aṭṭhakathācariyā passitabbaṁ na passanti,
anya-e0804n3:351_14: atitthe pakkhandantī”ti tesaṁ doso hotīti? Na hoti,
anya-e0804n3:351_16: tathā hi aṭṭhakathācariyehi “abhivādetvā”ti ettha “vadī abhivādanathutīsū”ti dhātuyā atthamaggahetvā
anya-e0804n3:351_17: vohāravisaye kosallasamannāgatattā saṇhasukhumamatthaṁ sotūnaṁ bodhetuṁ “vada viyattiyaṁ vācāya”nti dhātuyevatthaṁ
anya-e0804n3:351_18: gahetvā kāritapaccayaparikappanena kāritatthamādāya “abhivādetvāti ‘sukhī arogo hotū’ti vadāpetvā,
anya-e0804n3:351_19: vandanto hi atthato evaṁ vadāpeti nāmā”ti hetukattuvasena abhivādanasaddattho vuttoti na koci tesaṁ doso.
anya-e0804n3:351_22: idampi ṭhānaṁ sukhumaṁ sādhukaṁ manasi kātabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:354_6: Puriso sūdaṁ sūdena vā odanaṁ randhāpeti,
anya-e0804n3:356_0: Gandha sūcane addane ca. Sūcanaṁ. Pakāsanaṁ. Addanaṁ pariplutā. Gandheti, gandhayati, gandho.
anya-e0804n3:357_0: Ettha gandhoti gandheti attano vatthuṁ sūcayati pakāsetīti gandho.
anya-e0804n3:357_1: Paṭicchannaṁ vā pupphaphalādiṁ “idamettha atthī”ti pesuññaṁ upasaṁharanto viya pakāsetīti gandho.
anya-e0804n3:357_2: Gamudharadhātudvayavasenapi gandhasaddattho vattabbo “gacchanto dhariyatīti gandho” iti,
anya-e0804n3:357_5: Gandhasaddo ca “uppalagandhatheno”ti ettha chedane vattatīti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0804n3:360_0: Vaddha chedanapūraṇesu. Vaddheti, vaddhayati. Vaddhakī. Vaddhakīti gahakārako.
anya-e0804n3:364_1: Diṭṭhūpasaṁhāro nāma cakkhusaññitāya diṭṭhiyā upasaṁhāro apanayanaṁ vināso vā.
anya-e0804n3:364_2: Cakkhu hi passanti etāyāti diṭṭhīti vuccati.
anya-e0804n3:364_3: Yaṁ sandhāya aṭṭhakathāsu “sasambhāracakkhuno setamaṇḍalaparikkhittassa kaṇhamaṇḍalassa majjhe abhimukhaṁ
anya-e0804n3:364_5: Ṭīkāyampi ca “diṭṭhimaṇḍaleti abhimukhaṭṭhitānaṁ sarīrasaṇṭhānuppattidesabhūte cakkhusaññitāya diṭṭhiyā maṇḍale”ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:364_6: Evaṁbhūtāya diṭṭhiyā upasaṁhāre andhadhātu vattati. Andheti,
anya-e0804n3:364_10: Dvinnaṁ cakkhūnaṁ ekassa vā vasena naṭṭhanayano,
anya-e0804n3:364_12: Kaccāyane pana “khādāmagamānaṁ khandhandhagandhā”ti vacanena amadhātussa andhādesakaraṇavasena rūpanipphatti dassitā.
anya-e0804n3:365_0: Badha bandhane. Migaṁ bādheti, bādhayati. Baddho migo, baddhosi mārapāsena.
anya-e0804n3:366_0: Tattha bādhetīti bandhatīti suddhakattuvasena attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n3:366_3: yo anicchantimicchasī”ti ettha bādhesīti bandhasīti suddhakattuvasena attho.
anya-e0804n3:366_4: Bhūvādigaṇe pana “bādha baddhāya”nti bādhadhātussa vasena “bādhatī”ti kattupadaṁ “bādheti,
anya-e0804n3:369_0: Mānapūjāyaṁ pemane vīmaṁsāyaṁ. Māneti, mānayati. Mātā. Vimāneti,
anya-e0804n3:370_0: Amānanā yattha santo, santānaṁ vā vimānanā;
anya-e0804n3:371_0: Hīnasammānanā vāpi, na tattha vasatiṁ vase.
anya-e0804n3:373_1: aṭṭhakathāsu pana “mānentī”ti etasmiṁ ṭhāne ayamattho dassito “mānentīti manena piyāyanti.
anya-e0804n3:374_0: Mana thambhe. Thambho cittassa thaddhatā. Māneti, mānayati. Māno.
anya-e0804n3:375_0: Thana devasadde. Devasaddo meghasaddo, thaneti, thanayati.
anya-e0804n3:379_0: Ūna parihāniyaṁ. Ūneti, ūnayati. Ūno loko.
anya-e0804n3:380_0: Dhana sadde. Dhaneti, dhanayati, dhaniyyati. Dhani, dhanaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:381_2: tañhi mama idanti dhanāyitabbaṁ saddāyitabbanti dhananti.
anya-e0804n3:386_0: Ñapa tosananisānesu. Ñāpeti, ñāpayati, paññāpeti, paññāpayati, paññatti.
anya-e0804n3:387_1: Tattha paññāpetīti katanibbacanehi vākyāvayavehi vitthāravasena niravasesato desitehi veneyyānaṁ cittaparitosanaṁ buddhinisānañca karotīti attho.
anya-e0804n3:387_7: Kārite “puriso purisena āsanaṁ paññapāpetī”ti ekameva padaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:387_9: paññāpayatī”ti rūpāni yadā “ñā avabodhane”ti imissā rūpāni siyuṁ,
anya-e0804n3:388_0: Lapa viyattiyaṁ vācāyaṁ. Lapeti, lapayati. Lāpo, lapanaṁ, ālāpo, sallāpo, kathāsallāpo, lapitaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:389_0: Byapa dāhe. Jhāpeti, jhāpayati. Jhatto, jhānaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:390_0: Tattha jhattoti khuddāpareto pācanagginā jhāpitoti jhatto,
anya-e0804n3:391_0: Rūpa rūpakriyāyaṁ. Rūpakriyā nāma pakāsanakriyā. Rūpeti, rūpayati. Rūpaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:392_2: Divādigaṇe panāyaṁ “rūpaṁ ruppane”ti bhijjanādiatthaṁ gahetvā ṭhitā.
anya-e0804n3:394_0: Kappa vitakke vidhimhi chedane ca. Kappeti,
anya-e0804n3:396_2: yathā taṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassā”ti evamādīsu abhisaddahanamattho.
anya-e0804n3:396_3: “Anujānāmi bhikkhave pañcahi samaṇakappehi phalaṁ paribhuñjitu”nti evamādīsu vohāro.
anya-e0804n3:397_0: Atha vā kappasaddo saupasaggo anupasaggo ca vitakkavidhānapaṭibhāgapaññattikālaparamāyuvohārasamantabhāvābhisaddahana
anya-e0804n3:397_1: chedana viniyoga vinaya kriyā lesantara kappataṇhādiṭṭhiasaṅkhyeyyakappamahākappādīsu dissati.
anya-e0804n3:397_5: “Satthukappena vata bho sāvakena saddhiṁ mantayamānā na jānimhā”tiādīsu paṭibhāge,
anya-e0804n3:397_9: “Ākaṅkhamāno ānanda tathāgato kappaṁ vātiṭṭheyya kappāvasesaṁ vā”tiādīsu paramāyumhi.
anya-e0804n3:397_11: “Anujānāmi bhikkhave pañcahi samaṇakappehi phalaṁ paribhuñjitu”ntiādīsu samaṇavohāre.
anya-e0804n3:397_23: kappaṁ nirayamhi paccatī”ti ca ādīsu antarakappe.
anya-e0804n3:402_1: Tathā hi vuttaṁ niddese “kappoti uddānato dve kappā taṇhākappo diṭṭhikappo”ti.
anya-e0804n3:403_0: Vitakke ca vidhāne ca, paṭibhāge tatheva ca;
anya-e0804n3:404_0: Paññattiyaṁ tathā kāle, paramāyumhi ca chedane.
anya-e0804n3:409_6: kampeti hadayaṁ mamā”ti akammakāya dhātuyā sakammakarūpadassanato.
anya-e0804n3:411_0: Thūpa samussaye. Samussayo āroho ubbedho. Thūpeti, thūpayati. Thūpo, thūpikā.
anya-e0804n3:416_0: Ḍapa ḍipa saṅghāte. Ḍāpeti. Ḍāpayati. Ḍepeti, ḍepayati.
anya-e0804n3:418_0: Gupa kupa dhūpa bhāsāyaṁ. Gopeti, gopayati. Kopeti, kopayati. Dhūpeti, dhūpayati.
anya-e0804n3:420_0: Khepa peraṇe. Peraṇaṁ cuṇṇikaraṇaṁ, khepeti, khepayati.
anya-e0804n3:423_0: Tapa dāhe. Tapeti, tapayati. Tapo, tāpo. Ātāpo, santāpo. Kārite – tāpeti, tāpayati.
anya-e0804n3:423_1: Tattha tapoti akusalānaṁ tāpanaṭṭhena tapo, sīlaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:425_2: Ettha purime saralopo thassa ṭhattaṁ visadisabhāvena dvittañca.
anya-e0804n3:426_0: Māpa māpane. Paṇṇasālaṁ māpeti, māpayati. Yo pāṇamatimāpeti, paṇṇasālā sumāpitā.
anya-e0804n3:427_0: Yapa yāpane. Yāpanaṁ pavattanaṁ. Tena so tattha yāpeti. Yāpayati. Yāpanā.
anya-e0804n3:428_0: Tattha yāpetīti idaṁ yādhātussa payogatte sati kāritapadaṁ bhavati.
anya-e0804n3:432_0: Samba sambandhe. Sambandho daḷhabandhanaṁ. Sambeti, sambayati. Sambalaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:433_0: Sabi maṇḍale. Maṇḍalaṁ parimaṇḍalatā. Rūpaṁ tādisameva.
anya-e0804n3:435_0: Lubi dubi addane. Addanaṁ hiṁsā. Lumbeti, lumbayati. Dumbeti, dumbayati.
anya-e0804n3:436_0: Pubba niketane. Niketanaṁ nivāso. Pubbeti, pubbayati.
anya-e0804n3:437_0: Gabba māne. Māno ahaṁkāro. Gabbeti, gabbayati. Gabbanaṁ, gabbito. Tattha gabbatīti na saṅkucati.
anya-e0804n3:441_0: Tattha bhāvetīti puriso gacchantaṁ purisamanugacchanto pāpuṇātīti attho.
anya-e0804n3:441_2: Ettha ca “bhāvetī”tiādīni yattha sace “bhū sattāya”nti dhātuyā rūpāni honti,
anya-e0804n3:441_9: bhū pattiya”nti dvigaṇikānaṁ dvinnaṁ dhātūnaṁ vasena aṭṭhakathāṭīkānayanissitaṁ atthaṁ pakāsayissāma āgamikānaṁ kosallatthāya.
anya-e0804n3:441_10: Tattha cakkhubhūtoti yathā cakkhu sattānaṁ dassanatthaṁ pariṇeti,
anya-e0804n3:441_12: Atha vā cakkhu viya bhūtotipi cakkhubhūto.
anya-e0804n3:441_13: Paññācakkhumayattā vā sayambhūñāṇena paññācakkhuṁ bhūto pattoti cakkhubhūto.
anya-e0804n3:441_15: asādhāraṇaṁ vā ñāṇaṁ bhūto pattoti ñāṇabhūto,
anya-e0804n3:441_17: pariyattidhammappavattanato vā hadayena cintetvā vācāya nicchāritadhammamayoti dhammabhūto.
anya-e0804n3:441_18: Bodhipakkhiyadhammehi vā uppannattā lokassa ca taduppādanato anaññasādhāraṇaṁ vā dhammaṁ bhūto pattoti dhammabhūto.
anya-e0804n3:441_20: Atha vā brahmaṁ vuccati maggo tena uppannattā lokassa ca taduppādanattā,
anya-e0804n3:441_22: Evaṁ dvinnaṁ dhātūnaṁ vasena vutto attho veditabbo.
anya-e0804n3:442_1: “Tātā mayaṁ mahallakā suddhodanamahārājaputtaṁ buddhabhūtaṁ sambhāveyyāma vā no vā,
anya-e0804n3:442_2: tumhe tassa sāsane pabbajeyyāthā”ti ca “atha kho therā bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ revataṁ sahajātiyaṁ sambhāviṁsū”ti cāti.
anya-e0804n3:443_0: Bhū avakampane. Ayampi sakammako. Bhāveti, bhāvayati. Manobhāvanīyā bhikkhū.
anya-e0804n3:444_0: Ettha ca bhāvetīti anukampati puttaṁ vā bhātaraṁ vā yaṁkiñci.
anya-e0804n3:444_1: Manobhāvanīyāti “dīghāyukā hontu bhadantā arogā abyāpajjā”ti evamādinā bhāvetabbā anukampitabbāti manobhāvanīyā.
anya-e0804n3:447_0: Lābha pesane. Lābheti, lābhayati. “Labha lābheti dhātussa rūpāni ce, kāritarūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n3:448_0: Dabhī bhaye. Īkārantāyaṁ dhātu, tena saniggahītāgamāni rūpāni na bhavanti. Dabheti, dabhayati.
anya-e0804n3:450_0: Vambha viddhaṁsane. Vambheti, vambhayati. Vambhanā. Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhuṁ vambhenti.
anya-e0804n3:453_0: Ātena camu dhovane. Āpubbo camudhātu dhovane vattati. Ācameti, ācamayati. Ācamanakumbhī.
anya-e0804n3:454_0: Ettha pana “tato hi so ācamayitvā licchavī,
anya-e0804n3:454_1: therassa datvā yugāni aṭṭhā”ti appasakkārapetavatthupāḷippadeso nidassanaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:454_3: Ayaṁ pana dhātu bhūvādigaṇikatte “camatī”ti bhakkhanatthaṁ gahetvā tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0804n3:455_0: Kamu icchākantīsu. Kāmeti, kāmayati. Kāmo, kanti, nikanti, kāmanā,
anya-e0804n3:456_0: Ettha ca kāmoti rūpādivisayaṁ kāmetīti kāmo.
anya-e0804n3:456_5: So hi accantakaṇhadhammasamaṅgitāya papañcasamatikkantepi buddhapaccekabuddhabuddhasāvake attano vase ṭhapetuṁ kāmetīti “kāmo”ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n3:461_0: Kāmo namuci kaṇho ca, vasavattī pajāpati;
anya-e0804n3:463_0: Kandappo ca ratipati, māro ca kusumāyudho;
anya-e0804n3:464_1: Tāni sāsanānulomāni na hontīti idha na dassitāni.
anya-e0804n3:465_0: Idāni abhikkantasaddassa bhūvādigaṇe “kamu padavikkhepe”ti vohārasīsena vuttassa kamudhātussa vasena
anya-e0804n3:465_1: idha ca “kamu icchākantīsū”ti vuttassa kamudhātussa vasena atthuddhāraṁ kathayāma.
anya-e0804n3:465_6: “Ayaṁ imesaṁ catunnaṁ puggalānaṁ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”tiādīsu sundare.
anya-e0804n3:466_0: “Ko me vandati pādāni, iddhiyā yasasā jalaṁ;
anya-e0804n3:471_0: Thoma silāghāyaṁ. Silāghā pasaṁsā. Thometi, thomayati. Thomito, thomanā.
anya-e0804n3:474_2: “Yo yajetha sataṁ sama”nti ettha hi samāsaddo itthiliṅgo,
anya-e0804n3:475_0: Imāni saṁvaccharassa nāmāni “saṁvaccharo, vaccharo, samā, hāyano, sarado,
anya-e0804n3:476_0: Sama ālocane. Ālocanaṁ pekkhanaṁ. Sāmeti, sāmayati. Nisāmanaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:477_4: Dhātūnamatthātisayena yogoti vacanato pana upasaggayogato vā savanepi ayaṁ vattati.
anya-e0804n3:478_0: Ama roge. Ameti, amayati. Andho. Bilaṅkapādo andhanakho.
anya-e0804n3:479_0: Tattha andhoti naṭṭhanayano vuccati. Andhanakhoti pūtinakho. Ubhayathāpi sarogattaṁ sūcitaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:482_0: Sāma svāntane āmantane. Svāntanaṁ sāmappayogo. Āmantanaṁ avhāyanaṁ pakkosanaṁ. Sāmeti, sāmayati.
anya-e0804n3:484_3: idha pana upasagganipātapubbakāni katvā “āgametī”tiādīni suddhakattuvasena vuttānīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:494_1: Ettha ca “iti kho ānanda kusalāni sīlāni anupubbena aggāya parentī”ti pāḷi nidassanaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:498_0: Vara icchāyaṁ. Vareti, varayati. Varo, varaṁ, varanto.
anya-e0804n3:499_0: Tattha varoti variyate varitabboti varo. Varanti varetīti varaṁ, icchanto patthentoti attho.
anya-e0804n3:501_0: Muttaṁ muttaṁ sudassanaṁ, vande bodhivaraṁ vara”nti
anya-e0804n3:503_0: Sara akkhepe. Sareti, sarayati. Saro. Saroti saddo.
anya-e0804n3:504_0: Sāra dubbalye. Sāreti, sārayati. Dubbalo bhavatīti attho.
anya-e0804n3:505_0: Kumāra kīḷāyaṁ. Kumāreti, kumārayati. Kumāro, kumārako. Kumārī, kumārikā.
anya-e0804n3:506_0: Ettha kumārayati tattha tattha kīḷatīti kumāro. So eva atidaharattā kumārako. Esa nayo itaratrāpi.
anya-e0804n3:507_1: Vikkanti vikkamanaṁ. Sūreti, sūrayati. Vīreti, vīrayati. Sūro, vīro.
anya-e0804n3:507_2: Sāsanikehi pana saddhammavidūhi evaṁ dhātusabhāvānampi sūravīrasaddānaṁ nibbacanaṁ na dassitaṁ,
anya-e0804n3:507_3: kevalaṁ pana tattha tattha “sūroti visiṭṭhauro”ti ca “mahāvīroti mahāvikkanto”ti ca “vīroti vīriyavā”ti ca atthavivaraṇamattameva dassitaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:508_1: Kammasampatti nāma kammassa parisamāpanaṁ niṭṭhāpanaṁ. Pāreti, pārayati. Tīreti, tīrayati. Pāraṁ. Tīraṁ.
anya-e0804n3:509_0: Tattha na pāremīti chindituṁ na sakkomīti attho.
anya-e0804n3:511_0: Jara vayohānimhi. Jareti, jarayati. Jarā. Pāḷiyaṁ pana “jīratī”ti pāṭho.
anya-e0804n3:513_0: Dhara dhāraṇe. Dhāreti, dhārayati. Ādhāro, ādhārako, dhammo iccādīni.
anya-e0804n3:514_0: Tattha dhammoti anekavidhesu dhammesu lokuttaro uppādito sacchikato ca catūsu apāyesu saṁsāre vā satte apatamāne dhāretīti dhammo.
anya-e0804n3:514_4: Kakkhaḷattādinā phusanādinā santiādinā sakasakabhāvena paṇḍitehi dhāriyati sallakkhiyatītipi dhammo.
anya-e0804n3:514_5: Tepiṭako pana pāḷidhammo sakatthaparatthādibhee atthe dhāretīti dhammo.
anya-e0804n3:514_6: Keci tu vidū “pāpake akusale dhamme dhunāti kampeti viddhaṁsetīti dhammo”ti dhūdhātuvasenapi nibbacanaṁ vadanti,
anya-e0804n3:515_1: Ayañhi “dhammaṁ pariyāpuṇāti suttaṁ geyya”ntiādīsu pariyattiyaṁ dissati.
anya-e0804n3:516_0: “Na hi dhammo adhammo ca, ubho samavipākino;
anya-e0804n3:517_0: Adhammo nirayaṁ neti, dhammo pāpeti suggati”nti
anya-e0804n3:519_1: Ayañhi “kusalā dhammā akusalā dhammā abyākatā dhammā”tiādīsu sabhāve dissati.
anya-e0804n3:521_0: Saccaṁ dhammo dhiti cāgo, sa ve pecca na socatī”ti
anya-e0804n3:523_0: “Na hi dhammo adhammo ca, ubho samavipākino;
anya-e0804n3:524_0: Adhammo nirayaṁ neti, dhammo pāpeti suggati”ntiādīsu
anya-e0804n3:525_6: “Idha bhikkhu dhammaṁ jānāti suttaṁ geyyaṁ veyyākaraṇa”ntiādīsu pariyattiyaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:526_0: Atha vā dhammasaddo pariyattisaccasamādhipaññāpakatipuññāpattiñeyyādīsu bahūsu atthesu diṭṭhappayogo.
anya-e0804n3:526_1: Tathā hi “idha bhikkhu dhammaṁ pariyāpuṇātī”tiādīsu pariyattiyaṁ dissati.
anya-e0804n3:526_10: tattha tattha pana ādisaddena yuttivisayādayo ca atthā gahetabbā.
anya-e0804n3:527_0: “Nesa dhammo mahārāja, yaṁ tvaṁ gaccheyya ekako;
anya-e0804n3:528_0: Ahampi tena gacchāmi, yena gacchasi khattiyā”ti
anya-e0804n3:529_1: “Manañca paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manoviññāṇa”ntiādīsu visaye.
anya-e0804n3:529_2: “Satañca dhammo na jaraṁ upetī”ti ettha nibbāne vattati.
anya-e0804n3:532_0: Sabhāve ceva paññāyaṁ, puññe paññattiyampi ca.
anya-e0804n3:536_0: Keci pana dhammasaddassa pavattivisayānaṁ dasadhāva paricchedaṁ vadanti.
anya-e0804n3:537_0: Ñeyyamagge ca nibbāne, sabhāve atha jātiyaṁ;
anya-e0804n3:540_0: Tatra atthuddhāroti samānasaddavacanīyānaṁ atthānaṁ uddharaṇaṁ atthuddhāro.
anya-e0804n3:543_1: “Rakkhaṇaṁ, tāṇaṁ, gopanaṁ, avanaṁ, pālanaṁ, rakkhā, rakkhaṇā,
anya-e0804n3:543_2: gutti” iccete pariyāyā. Pāleti, pālayati. Pālako,
anya-e0804n3:543_5: Samo bhavatu pālinā. Pālito, pālanaṁ, pāḷi.
anya-e0804n3:544_2: Atha vā antodakaṁ rakkhaṇaṭṭhena mahato taḷākassa thirā mahatīti pāḷi viyāti pāḷi,
anya-e0804n3:544_4: Aparo nayo pakaṭṭhānaṁ ukkaṭṭhānaṁ sīlādiatthānaṁ bodhanato sabhāvaniruttibhāvato buddhādīhi bhāsitattā ca pakaṭṭhānaṁ vacanappabandhānaṁ āḷīti pāḷi.
anya-e0804n3:548_0: Tila sinehane. Teleti, telayati. Telaṁ, tilo, tilaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:549_6: “tilasinehane”ti evaṁ vuttāya tiladhātuyā sāmaññato yassa kassaci sinehassa vacanato.
anya-e0804n3:549_10: tila”nti saddarūpānaṁ pakāsanamukhena “tilānaṁ idanti tela”nti vadāma,
anya-e0804n3:549_11: na pana tena vacanena sāsapādīnaṁ sinehassa atelattaṁ vadāma.
anya-e0804n3:549_13: Taddhitavidhāne viññunaṁ kosallatthaṁ tilasaddaṁ paṭicca “tilānaṁ idanti tela”nti vadāma.
anya-e0804n3:549_14: Sinehasaṅkhātassa sāsapādīnaṁ telassa vacanaṁ na jahāma,
anya-e0804n3:549_18: Idañhi vacanaṁ telassa sāmaññato sinehe pavattiṁ dīpeti.
anya-e0804n3:550_0: Jala apavāraṇe. Jāleti, jālayati. Jālaṁ, jālā. Jālanti macchajālaṁ. Jālāti aggijālā.
anya-e0804n3:551_0: Khala soceyye. Soceyyaṁ sucibhāvo. Khāleti, khālayati. Pakkhāleti, pakkhālayati.
anya-e0804n3:552_0: Tala patiṭṭhāyaṁ. Tāleti, tālayati. Tālo, talaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:553_2: Tañhi tālayati patiṭṭhāti ettha vatthujātanti talaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:555_0: Dulaukkhepe. Ukkhepo uddhaṁ khipanaṁ. Doleti, dolayati. Dolā.
anya-e0804n3:556_0: Ettha ca doliyati ukkhipiyati yattha nipanno dārako, yathānipannako vāti dolā.
anya-e0804n3:558_0: Mīla nimīlane. Mīleti, mīlayati. Mīlanaṁ, ummīlanaṁ, nimīlanaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:560_0: Tattha mūlanti mūlayati rūhati rukkhādi etenāti mūlaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:560_1: Atha vā mūlayati chinnopi koci etena acchinnena punadeva rūhatīti mūlaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:566_0: Kala pila khepe. Kāleti, kālayati. Kālo. Pileti, pilayati.
anya-e0804n3:567_1: Tatra samayo tesaṁ tesaṁ sattānaṁ āyuṁ kālayati khepeti divase divase appaṁ appaṁ karotīti kāloti vuccati.
anya-e0804n3:570_0: Maccu pana kālayati tesaṁ tesaṁ sattānaṁ jīvitaṁ khepeti samucchedavasena nāsetīti kāloti vuccati.
anya-e0804n3:570_4: “Maraṇaṁ hindaṁ maccu maṭṭu cuti kālo antako nikkhepo”ti maraṇassābhidhānāni.
anya-e0804n3:575_0: Dala vidāraṇe. Dāleti, dālayati, padāleti, padālayati. Kudālo.
anya-e0804n3:576_0: Kala gatisaṅkhyānesu. Kāleti, kālayati. Kālo, kalā.
anya-e0804n3:577_2: patiṭṭhāvasena ādhārabhāvo. Sīleti, sīlayati. Sīlaṁ, sīlanaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:578_0: Ettha sīlanti sīleti upadhāreti taṁsamaṅgīpuggalaṁ apāyesu uppattinivāraṇavasena bhuso dhāretīti sīlaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:578_1: Atha vāsīliyati upacāriyati sappurisehi hadayamaṁsantaraṁ upanetvā dhāriyatīti sīlaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:578_7: Aṭṭhakathāsu hi “kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ patiṭṭhāvasena ādhārabhāvo upadhāraṇa”nti vutto.
anya-e0804n3:579_1: Keci “vela iti dhātusaddo na hotī”ti vadanti,
anya-e0804n3:580_4: Lokassa vimatiṁ pāleti lunāti sodheti cāti palaṁ. Mūleti, mūlayati.
anya-e0804n3:581_0: Thūla paribrūhane. Paribrūhanaṁ vaḍḍhanaṁ. Thūleti, thūlayati. Thūlo puriso. Thūlā javena hāyanti.
anya-e0804n3:586_0: Divu parikūjane. Parikūjanaṁ gajjanaṁ. Deveti, devayati. Devo ca paridevitvā. Devoti megho.
anya-e0804n3:587_0: Divuaddane. Addanaṁ gandhapisananti vadanti. Deveti, devayati.
anya-e0804n3:591_1: Imāni rūpāni kiñcāpi bhūvādigaṇikaṁ “posetī”ti rūpaṁ paṭicca hetukatturūpāni viya dissanti,
anya-e0804n3:591_2: tathāpi “aññepi devo posetī”tiādikassa curādigaṇikarūpassa dassanato suddhakattuvasena vuttānīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:599_1: So hi puriso viya sātisayaṁ paccāmitte na puṁseti abhimaddanaṁ kātuṁ na sakkotīti napuṁsakoti vuccati.
anya-e0804n3:599_4: Tathā hi saddasatthavidū taṁ puggalaṁ napuṁsakaliṅgavasena napuṁsakanti vadanti.
anya-e0804n3:601_0: Rusa rosane. Rosanaṁ kopakaraṇaṁ. Roseti, rosayati. Roso. Rosoti kodho.
anya-e0804n3:604_3: Daṁsanti khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā etenāti daṁsano.
anya-e0804n3:606_0: Tassa santajjane. Tasseti, tassayati puriso core.
anya-e0804n3:607_0: Vassu sattibandhane. Sattibandhanaṁ samatthatākaraṇaṁ. Vasseti, vassayati.
anya-e0804n3:608_0: Jasa tāḷane. Tāḷanaṁ paharaṇaṁ. Jāseti, jāsayati.
anya-e0804n3:609_0: Pasa bandhane. Pāseti, pāsayati. Pāso. Pāsanti bandhanti satte etenāti pāso, sakuṇapāsādi.
anya-e0804n3:610_0: Ghusi visaddane. Visaddanaṁ ugghosanaṁ. Ghoseti, ghosayati. Ghoso.
anya-e0804n3:611_1: Silyayogo lāsiyaṁ nāṭakanāṭanaṁ recakadānaṁ. Lāseti, lāsayati. Lāsento, lāsentī.
anya-e0804n3:611_5: Tattha lāsentīti yā uplavamānā viya uṭṭhahitvā lāsiyanāṭakaṁ nāṭenti,
anya-e0804n3:612_0: Bhūsa alaṅkāre. Bhūseti, bhūsayati. Vibhūseti, vibhūsayati. Bhūsanaṁ, vibhūsanaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:613_0: Vasa sinehanachedāvaharaṇesu. Avaharaṇaṁ corikāya gahaṇaṁ. Vāseti, vāsayati. Vasā.
anya-e0804n3:614_0: Tāsa vāraṇe. Vāraṇaṁ nivāraṇaṁ. Tāseti, tāsayati.
anya-e0804n3:617_0: Pusa dhāraṇe. Poseti, posayati, ābharaṇaṁ dhāretīti attho.
anya-e0804n3:618_0: Tusi pisi kusi dasi bhāsāyaṁ. Tuṁseti,
anya-e0804n3:620_0: Gavesa maggane. Gaveseti, gavesayati. Gavesako, gavesito, gavesanā, gaveṭṭhi.
anya-e0804n3:621_0: Vāsa upasevāyaṁ. Vāseti, vāsayati. Vāso, āvāso.
anya-e0804n3:623_0: Nivāsa acchādane. Vatthaṁ nivāseti, nivāsayati. Pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā.
anya-e0804n3:625_0: Ettha ca aṁsoti koṭṭhāsopi khandhopi vuccati. Aṁsāti arisarogo.
anya-e0804n3:627_0: Rasa assādane. Raseti, rasayati. Raso. Rasiyate assādiyate janehīti raso.
anya-e0804n3:629_3: yaṁ sandhāya brāhmaṇā bhagavantaṁ “arasarūpo samaṇo gotamo”ti avocuṁ.
anya-e0804n3:635_0: Pisa pesane. Peseti, pesayati. Pesako, pesito.
anya-e0804n3:636_0: Ghusasadde. Ghoseti, ghosayati. Ugghosayuṁ bodhimaṇḍe pamoditā. Ghoso.
anya-e0804n3:637_0: Disī uccāraṇe. Deseti, desayati. Desako, desetā, desito, desanā.
anya-e0804n3:638_0: Vasa acchādane. Vāseti, vāsayati. Nivāseti, nivāsayati. Vatthaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:641_0: Araha pūjāyaṁ. Araheti, arahayati. Arahā, arahaṁ. “Arahā, khīṇāsavo, asekkho”ti arahato nāmāni.
anya-e0804n3:644_1: “Eṇeyyā ca varāhā cā”ti ettha hi sūkaro “varāho”ti vutto,
anya-e0804n3:647_0: Maha pūjāyaṁ. Maheti, mahayati. Mahito rājā mahārājā. Vihāramaho, cetiyamaho.
anya-e0804n3:648_0: Piha icchāyaṁ. Piheti, pihayati. Pihā, pihālu, apiho, pihanīyā vibhūtiyo.
anya-e0804n3:649_0: Kuhavimhāpane. Kuheti, kuhayati. Kuhako. Kuhayati lokavimhāpanaṁ karotīti kuhako. Kuhanā.
anya-e0804n3:651_0: Garaha vinindane. Garaheti, garahayati. Garahā. Bhūvādigaṇikassa panassa “garahatī”ti rūpaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:654_0: Taḷa tāḷane. Tāḷeti, tāḷayati. Patāḷeti, patāḷayati. Tāḷaṁ. Tāḷanti kaṁsatāḷādi.
anya-e0804n3:660_3: Bhūvādigaṇaṭṭhāya pana vilāsanatthe vattamānāya etissā “laḷatī”ti rūpaṁ.
anya-e0804n3:661_0: Siḷa seḷane. Seḷeti, seḷayati. Seḷento. Ettha seḷetīti seḷitasaddaṁ karoti.
anya-e0804n3:663_0: Curādī ettakā diṭṭhā, dhātavo me yathābalaṁ;
anya-e0804n3:669_0: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṁ
